item.title: bbc 2
item.description: library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(tidyr) library(gapminder) library(ggplot2) library(ggalt) library(forcats) library(R.utils) ## Loading required package: R.oo ## Loading required package: R.methodsS3 ## R.methodsS3 v1.7.1 (2016-02-15) successfully loaded. See ?R.methodsS3 for help. ## R.oo v1.22.0 (2018-04-21) successfully loaded.

item.title: code r 6
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

item.title: Hello R Markdown
